hymn.title: God gave His Son to man to be
hymn.category: Experience of Christ—As Food and Drink

layout.singingstanza: God gave His Son to man to be The tree of life so rich and free, That ev -- ery man may taste and see That God is good for food. Yes, God is good for food! Yes, God is good for food! We've tast -- ed and we test -- i -- fy That God is good for food!

lyrics.stanza: God gave His Son to man to be The tree of life so rich and free, That every man may taste and see That God is good for food. Yes, God is good for food! Yes, God is good for food! We've tasted and we testify That God is good for food!

We eat this feast and take God in, And as we eat we live by Him, For all the elements within This feast are God Himself. Yes, Jesus is our feast! Yes, Jesus is our feast! We eat this feast and live by Him, For Jesus is our feast!

This feast is so enjoyable; To men it's so available, For God said whosoever will May come and freely eat. Yes, come and freely eat; Yes, come and freely eat. For God said whosoever will May come and freely eat.
